comment: Two states are whiter today than in . One other state is within a percentage point today from where it was in The states are Mississippi, South Carolina, and West Virginia, respectively. If that's what white survival looks like, how to convince SWPLs to take it?
amr:
# ::snt Two states are whiter today than in . One other state is within a percentage point today from where it was in The states are Mississippi, South Carolina, and West Virginia, respectively. If that's what white survival looks like, how to convince SWPLs to take it?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / whiter-01
            :ARG1 (s / state
                  :quant 2)
            :time (t / today)
            :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 s
                  :ARG3 (m2 / more)
                  :ARG4 (s2 / state
                        :location (t2 / there))))
      :snt2 (b / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (s3 / state
                  :quant 1
                  :mod (o / other))
            :ARG2 (r / relative-position
                  :op1 (b2 / be-located-at-91
                        :ARG1 s3
                        :ARG2 (p / point
                              :mod (p2 / percentage))))
            :time (t3 / today))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (s4 / state
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Mississippi"))
            :op2 (s5 / state
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "South"
                        :op2 "Carolina"))
            :op3 (s6 / state
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "West"
                        :op2 "Virginia")))
      :snt4 (h2 / have-condition-91
            :ARG1 (h3 / have-manner-91
                  :ARG1 (c / convince-01
                        :ARG1 (p3 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (p4 / political-party
                                          :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "SWL"))))
                        :ARG2 (t4 / take-01
                              :ARG0 p3
                              :ARG1 (ii / it)))
                  :ARG2 (l / look-02
                        :ARG0 (s7 / survive-01
                              :ARG0 p3)
                        :ARG1 (t5 / that)))
            :ARG2 (a2 / amr-unknown)))

comment: Use of hateful speech regarding people with a disability is cruel and unwarranted.
amr:
# ::snt Use of hateful speech regarding people with a disability is cruel and unwarranted.
(a / and
      :op1 (c / cruel)
      :op2 (w / warrant-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (s / speak-01
                        :ARG3-of (h / hate-01)
                        :topic (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (h2 / have-03
                                    :ARG1 (d / disability)))))))

comment: I can't continue this conversation with you if you continue to use offensive words.
amr:

(p / possible-01
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 (c / continue-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (c2 / converse-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG2 (y / you)
                  :mod (t / this)))
      :condition (c3 / continue-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (w / word
                        :ARG0-of (o / offend-01)))))

comment: Please do not use hate speech. Thank you
amr:
# ::snt Please do not use hate speech. Thank you
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (u / use-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (s / speak-01
                  :ARG1 (h / hate-01)))
      :snt2 (t / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (y2 / you)))
